spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch between the 2D plan and 3D render. The 2D shows a large DINING ROOM along the bottom, KITCHEN with PANTRY/REF zone at upper-right, a small WC near the top center, and a defined CENTRAL HALL/UTILITY/HVAC cluster near the middle-left. The 3D render instead shows a dominant central stair core with surrounding rooms that do not correspond in placement/shape to the dining/kitchen/utility/WC arrangement. Door and window positions do not align with the plan’s exterior openings (e.g., the long dining-room window band along the bottom edge is not represented correctly). Room proportions and overall footprint appear altered.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are inconsistent with the plan: the 2D kitchen should directly relate to pantry/ref and open to dining/breakfast zones, while the 3D breaks this into different room boundaries. Several plan-defined small service spaces (UTILITY/HVAC/CRAWLSPACE access) are not faithfully modeled. Multiple additional rooms/partitions appear that are not indicated on the provided plan segment. Wall thickness/door embedding look visually consistent internally, but they are not consistent with the plan’s wall lines and openings.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map to the 2D plan’s program: the plan segment indicates kitchen fixtures, pantry/ref, and dining area, but the 3D includes furniture/fixtures suggesting other rooms (e.g., bed-like element and larger bath/vanity setups) not present in the plan. Scales are plausible visually, but placement is not plan-accurate.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean with coherent materials and lighting. Isometric camera is acceptable and geometry is mostly tidy. However, some openings/trim alignment and a few wall/door junctions read simplified, and the scene composition prioritizes appearance over plan-faithful orthographic/isometric correctness.

detected_errors.description: Missing/unclearly represented DINING ROOM as defined in the 2D plan (large bottom space with long exterior window run).
Missing/unclearly represented BREAKFAST area shown at the upper-right of the 2D plan.
UTILITY ROOM / HVAC / crawlspace-access cluster from the 2D plan is not faithfully present as a matching set of rooms/closets.
KITCHEN location/shape does not match the 2D plan (plan shows kitchen at upper-right with specific pantry/ref adjacency; 3D partitions and footprint differ).
WC placement does not match the small WC shown near the top center of the 2D plan.
Exterior window placements do not align with the 2D plan’s openings (notably the long dining-room glazing along the bottom edge and right-side window/seat condition).
Door locations and swing/orientation are inconsistent with the 2D plan, especially around the central hall/service core.
Overall proportions/footprint appear distorted relative to the 2D plan (room widths and wall run lengths do not preserve plan dimensions).
Hallucinated rooms/uses: 3D includes bedroom-like and larger bathroom/vanity-like spaces not indicated in the provided 2D plan segment.
